channel.title: davidbaunach.com
channel.description: The Personal Website of Fr David Baunach

item.title: Home.txt
item.description: A short reflection on visiting home, which I will probably add to in the future. Link: https://davidbaunach.com/writings/home.txt

item.title: New Homily
item.description: Added my homily for last weekend to homilies.txt, particularly liked how I was able to structure it. The aesthetics are good. Link: https://davidbaunach.com/homilies/homilies.txt

item.title: A Saint Maker Plaintext Stylesheet.txt
item.description: Minimalist stylesheet for formating research papers in txt files. Link: https://davidbaunach.com/writings/a-saint-maker-plaintext-stylesheet.txt
